page.title: 04INTRODUCTION TO SOUTH BEDS.
page.content: Chalk and clay can be found and quarried in Houghton Regis,Luton & Dunstable but Houghton Regis is made of mostly chalk.In and around Luton & Dunstable is the main industrial area.The growth of towns has left its mark on the countryside.As more food has been produced from less land its physical appearance has changed.Houghton Regis became a town in the early 1980's after population and industrial growth.Houghton Regis has shops from Bedford Square round to Air Call.The Cement Works had two chimneys and the larger of the chimneys was built without planning permission and have been in use since 1964.From a quarry by the A5 chalk was transported by a train to the Cement Works.
